data.title: Blue Ocean Tourism: The Evolution of Friendship Islands in the Pacific
data.meta_description: Blue ocean tourism has been one of the most critical industries for sustainable socioeconomic development in the Pacific, while the Pacific island countries and territories commonly face severe geographical and resource constraints driven by their small domestic...
